description: After installing Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 118.0.2088.46, users may experience unexpected behavior such as browser crashes or instability. This behavior is correlated with the recent security vulnerability addressed in KB-118.0.2088.46, which is related to CVE-2023-5473. Users should verify the update installation to mitigate issues. For further details, refer to the update documentation provided by Microsoft in the security update guide.
